articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 6 Is Coming in July, Report Says - CNET
articles.description: The Galaxy Z Fold 6 could be about four months away from being announced, possibly with a boxier design.
articles.content: The Galaxy Z Fold 6, likely the next update to the Samsung folding smartphone, appears primed to launch this summer. And this year, it looks like it'll be taking on a boxier design, with squared edge… [+2109 chars]
